entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • roslyn-lsp --stdio option #76436
  • API Proposal: Allow creating custom Workspace classes #76433
  • Area - Simplify Delegate Invocation #76425

Closed

  • roslyn-lsp --stdio option (or --pipe with a client-created pipe) #72871
    Backlog
  • Shift+Tab (Outdent / Decrease Indent) does not work in virtual space #55050
  • The compiler should report an error about references to out-of-scope stack memory generated by [UnscopedRef], defensively copied struct and pattern matching #75484
    17.13
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build feature.debugger.shadowDebug-35613.136 #76432
  • Localized string key in generated .editorconfig #39602
  • "display inline parameter name hints" shortcut not working when "Display all hints while pressing Alt+F1" is checked #58839
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-35613.82 #76426

PullRequests

Created

  • Pass caller argument expression through RoslynDebug.Assert #76435
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Capture some of the invariants around InputType/NarrowedType in patterns #76434
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Remove Edgio CDN usage #76431
    Area-IDE, OnDeckForServicing, VSCode
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2601449 #76430
    auto-merge
  • Fix crash with simplify delegate invoke #76427
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode

Merged

  • Handle deconstruct pattern in ref safety analysis #75511
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Pull computation up in extract method #76429
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Reduce allocations again in ComputeReverseReferencesMap #76417
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • feat(lsp): add --pipe parameter #76351
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Move code in extract method to shared location #76421
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Revert "Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2600919" #76428
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Add spec for the data section string literals feature #76139
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, Feature - String Literals in Data Section as UTF8
  • Merge release/dev17.13 to main #76387
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Needs API Review, VSCode
  • Restrict some types in object initializer setters when not directly settable #75507
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode
  • Fix primary ctor param in static context #74580
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode
  • Warn for redundant pattern in `not ... or <redundant>` pattern #75581
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, VSCode
  • Call Enter/LeaveRegion APIs for binary expressions #76412
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, VSCode
  • Simplify parsing #76411
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Dictionary expressions: initial binding and lowering support #76257
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Needs API Review, Feature - Dictionary Expressions
